    • Method Detail

      • getSmsTextVariables

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSmsTextVariables(java.util.List<MemberGroup> groups)
        Description copied from interface: SmsMailingService
        Returns a map with the variables that can be used in the SMS mailing text. The elements of the map contains name of the variable and the internal name. e.g: [Mobile Phone, mobilePhone],[User name, username] etc... The resulting variables are found based on the given groups.
        Specified by:
        getSmsTextVariables in interface SmsMailingService

      • getSmsTextVariables

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSmsTextVariables(java.util.List<MemberGroup> groups,
                                                                   Member member,
                                                                   boolean onlyVariableNames)
        Description copied from interface: SmsMailingServiceLocal
        Returns SMS text variables with their names, or with their values.
        Specified by:
        getSmsTextVariables in interface SmsMailingServiceLocal
        Parameters:
        groups - Used only with onlyVariableName in true. Only the common custom fields between the specified groups will be taken into account to determine the custom field variables.
        member - Element and custom fields variable values will be taken from this member. Used only with onlyVariableNames in false.
        onlyVariableNames - If true, the method will return a description for each variable.
        Returns:

      • getSmsTextVariables

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSmsTextVariables(Member member)
        Description copied from interface: SmsMailingService
        Returns a map with the variables that can be used in the SMS mailing text. The elements of the map contains name of the variable and the internal name. e.g: [Mobile Phone, mobilePhone],[User name, username] etc... The resulting variables are found based on the given member.
        Specified by:
        getSmsTextVariables in interface SmsMailingService
